title: Sins from my Stepmother: Forbidden Desires
description: Teddy Carlson has a confession to make...From a young age, Teddy has been aware of his stepmom's beauty. Workmen would wolf whistle her on the street. His girlfriends would seethe with jealousy at her curves. Even Teddy couldn't help but steal a look when given the chance.Not that Teddy ever had any problems with the girls. Tall, confident and good looking, he's also the star forward of his college water polo team.But Teddy has a confession to make.One summer, while staying at his sprawling family home in Greenwich, Teddy and his stepmother, Jill, did a bad, bad thing. And that's not even the worst part.How long before Teddy and Jill realize the price of sin?Compulsively readable, 'Sins from my Stepmother' is quality, taboo erotica.
author: C.R.R. Crawford
